title: CLL: FRINX OpenDaylight & UniConfig - First Steps
slug: Learn to install FRINX OpenDaylight with UniConfig and run a number of API calls from a Postman collection to configure an IOS XE networking device

files.title: Step 1: Mount a Cisco IOS XE device via CLI
Step 2: Check if the device is connected
Step 3: UniConfig API call to create loopback interface
Step 4: UniConfig API call to create loopback interface
Step 5: UniConfig API call to set IP address - OpenConfig
Step 7: Execute & Read API call to show interface counters details
